data.name: BorderLine
desc: describes the line type for a single cell edge.

items.name: Color
lines: contains the color value of the line.

items.name: InnerLineWidth
lines: contains the width of the inner part of a double line (in 1/100 mm).
If this value is zero, only a single line is drawn.

items.name: LineDistance
lines: contains the distance between the inner and outer parts of a double line (in 1/100 mm).

items.name: OuterLineWidth
lines: contains the width of a single line or the width of outer part of a double line (in 1/100 mm).
If this value is zero, no line is drawn.
